comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content:
George W. Boyd, for more than twelve years general passenger agent of the Pennsylvania Railroad, has been made passenger traffic manager to ...
Source: The Wall Street Journal; Feb 27, 1913

George W. Boyd has been promoted from general passenger agent to passenger traffic manager of the Pennsylvania railroad, succeeding J.R. Wood, retired under pension rules effective March 1.
Source:Christian Science Monitor; Feb 28, 1913
